title: Microtek lightning protector useful?
selftext:
Has anyone bought this thing? [https://www.microtekdirect.com/microtek-lightning-protector-6amp-156.html](https://www.microtekdirect.com/microtek-lightning-protector-6amp-156.html)

Was it useful for protecting devices against lightning?
